verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] decided to impose significant tariffs on Chinese goods , the latest leg in the ongoing tensions over trade between the two nations , according to published reports .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: decided] [ARG1: to impose significant tariffs on Chinese goods , the latest leg in the ongoing tensions over trade between the two nations] , [ARGM-ADV: according to published reports] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has decided to [V: impose] [ARG1: significant tariffs on Chinese goods] , the latest leg in the ongoing tensions over trade between the two nations , according to published reports .
President Donald Trump has decided to impose significant tariffs on Chinese goods , the latest leg in the ongoing tensions over trade between the two nations , [V: according] to published reports .

President Donald Trump has decided to impose significant tariffs on Chinese goods , the latest leg in the ongoing tensions over trade between the two nations , according to [V: published] [ARG1: reports] .
